1.content: Which character do you want to be a foot slave to?
1.title: Character Selection

choices: " Uhh... I don't know man... I'm kinda busy later. "
" Why don't you come to mine? I need help unpacking... "
" Why don't we go to the park or something? "
11.content:
It is the end of your first day in Springfield Elementary and you are nervous. All of the kids have been looking at you all day, and you are too scared to approach anyone. You are the last to leave the class, or so you think until suddenly you hear someone call you:

Bart: " Hey, new kid... "

You turn around to see Bart standing there at the back of the classroom.

Bart: " C'mere man, I wanna talk to ya'. "

You nervously approach Bart, who has a smug look on his face.

You: " You wanted me? "

Bart: " Yeah, listen man... I know it's scary joining a new school man. How about you come to mine and we can chill? Rather you hang around with someone like me who won't get you into trouble before you end up hanging with the wrong crowd... "

You didn't trust him, he had that certain look of mistrust about him in the way he spoke and looked at you. Although on the other hand, you didn't want to have another day of standing around in the playground by yourself.

You: " Umm... "
11.title: Bart

choices: Made to smell his bare socks and feet...
111.content:
After walking home after a long day of school you arrive at Bart's house. He opens the door to be confronted by Lisa.

Lisa: " Well, you're late... Where have you been? And whose this? "

Bart: " Oh, I was walking home with this guy. He's new at the school, he's pretty cool. We're just gonna' go up to the room and chill. Is mom or dad home yet? "

Lisa: " Nah, dad's at Moe's and mom's over at a friend's with Maggy. "

Bart: " Ah, cool... Well we're going upstairs. C'mon dude! "

You follow Bart up to his room. He opens the door and you step in. The floor is littered with dirty socks etc. After a while of sitting around doing nothing interesting, Bart suggests a game of dares.

Bart: " I'm bored man, you up for a game of dares? "

You: " Uh, I suppose... Nothing better to do right? "

Bart: " Alright, I'll start... I dare you to smell all the socks that are on my bedroom floor! Haha... "

You look horrified, there must have been at least 10 to 15 pairs of socks on the floor and each of them looked as if they had been worn for a week!

You: " Oh god, can you not choose something else? "

Bart: " Nope, a dare is a dare!

Bart handcuffs you to the bedpost to make sure you don't escape, he tapes your mouth to make sure you can't cheat.

Bart: " Alright dude, you ready? Who am I kidding... I don't care if you're ready or not! "

You are laid on the floor, and Bart sits on your stomach. He has collected all the rank socks from around the room.

Bart: " These are the ones from last week, I had wore them around a week and a half! Just think of all the sweat that is in these socks... "

Bart shoves it on your nose. You try not to breathe in and he notices that you are trying to hold your breath. He wiggles around as he sits on your stomach, forcing you to breathe in. It is the most vile smell you have ever come across. The socks looked as if they used to be white, but they were grey/black on the bottom. You smell the bit where the toes are supposed to be, and to make it worse he has turned the sock inside out.

Bart: " Haha, how does that smell? There's worse ones than that... Try this one! "

He forces another sock in your face, and another and another. When you have finished smelling every single sock in the room he takes the tape off your mouth.

Bart: " Did you enjoy that? "

You: " No! That was vile! "

Bart: " Well, that was just the first half. Now you have to put every sock in your mouth and suck on them one at a time! "

You: "Oh god, No.. Ple- "

Before you could finish, he crammed the first sock in your mouth. This was the first one he had made you smell. You could still taste the vinegary sweat from the sock, and it almost made you gag. After doing that to every single sock... he had decided that the game of dares was over. He had you exactly where he wanted you.... What next?
111.title: " Yeah, sure! "

choices: Bart puts you in his shoe and goes to a friends house...
Bart puts you in his shoe and shows you to Lisa...
Bart makes you a foot slave...
1111.content:
Bart: " Look what I found... "

You still had that vile sock in your mouth. Every time you swallowed, you could taste the vinegar from the sweat in your mouth. Bart had also taped one of his shoes to your nose, so you were being forced to taste and smell his shoes and socks. It was vile, but you were secretly starting to enjoy it a little.

Bart: " It's a shrink ray, don't worry... It has a reverse function. I just want to have a little fun with you that's all... "

You couldn't say anything because you had one of Bart's rank socks in your mouth, and one of his shoes over your nose. He aimed at at you, and fired. Suddenly you were the size of a fingernail. You looked up, still with Bart's sock in your mouth and his shoe in your face because they had shrunk too.

Bart: " Let's have some fun, I'm guessing you don't really have a choice. These socks I've been wearing for two weeks, and these shoes are pretty old too. I've not showed in around a week either... so you're probably going to enjoy this. "

Bart laid on his bed, and sat you to the pillow. He put his feet with his shoes and sock still on next to you, one on each side. There was no point in running, so you just went along with it.

What happens next?
1111.title: Bart finds a shrink ray...

11111.content:
Bart picks you up grinning at you before removing his left shoe. "Now we're gonna go introduce you to more of my friends, after all the best way to make friends at a new school is to not be afraid to meet new people" Bart says laughing to himself as he hovers you over the opening of the shoe. "Stay safe!" he says before dropping you into the shoe.

You land with a squelch on the sole of the shoe before you're covered in a shadow, looking up you see Bart's sock hovering over the opening. He cracks his toes allowing stray pieces of lint to shower down onto you before cramming his foot inside on top of you, sealing you in darkness.

Bart adjusts his foot in the shoe getting used to its new passenger before taking the first step forwards. All Bart's weight is pressing down on you from within your new prison as he makes his way to his friends house, the friend in question is none other than....
11111.title: Bart puts you in his shoe and goes to a friends...

choices: Forced to smell and service their feet...
11112.content:
Bart: " Ah, let me think... I have an idea that I think you might like! "

You begin to feel nervous and a little sick at the same time. You have no idea of what thoughts are going through Bart's head at this time. Suddenly, Bart moves and picks you up. He ties your hands behind your back and your legs together so that you can't move.

Bart: " Alright, I'm gonna take my shoe half off and you're gonna go in there... got it? "

You don't want to. You have a foot fetish and a thing for feet, but you start to get the feeling that this might be a little too much. There is nothing you can do anyway, your hands are tied... literally.

Bart: " I've had these socks on for like a week, this ain't gonna be pleasant. If you think this is the worst of it just wait till' you see who I'm showing you to next! "

Bart picks you up and places you inside his shoe, under his huge black sweaty socks. The smell is unbearable, but you don't have a choice. You see Bart's face at the top of his shoe.

Bart: " Bye bye little guy, see you soon! "

Suddenly, darkness. The musky smell of Bart's shoes and socks filled the air, and the air became very thick and warm. It was like breathing soup. It got extremely warm and sweaty, and all the sweat from Bart's feet and socks was soaking through your clothes so eventually you became covered in it too. You did spend a while in there though, and it had turned out that Bart was going skateboarding with some of his friends. It was very hot on this particular day, and every time he took a step your mouth was filled with sweaty sock.

Eventually he did get home, and you could hear people talking and it sounded like Bart and Lisa.

Bart: " Lisa! I have something to show you, come on... up to my room! "

Lisa: " Oh no, I'm not falling for that trick again.

Bart: " No, honestly. You have to trust me. This is amazing you have to come and see!"

Lisa: " Alright Bart, but I swear if this is another prank I am going to kill you! "

They made their way upstairs. By this time Bart's sweaty shoe had become like a sauna. The sock was so sweaty that you could actually see Bart's toes through the sock. All of a sudden, Bart's shoe came off. He picked you up and put you on the floor and you still were tied up.

Lisa: " Oh my god! What's he doing in there! "

Bart: " I thought we could have fun with him while mom and dad are away... "

Lisa: " What kind of fun? "

Bart: " Remember what we did to that other guy? Well, we're doing the same to this guy except he is one tenth the size! "

Lisa: " Haha, this sounds like it will be fun! "

What happens next?
11112.title: Bart puts you in his shoe and shows you to Lisa...

choices: Bart tapes you to the bottom of his foot, and you go somewhere...
Bart starts to remove his shorts...
11113.content:
Bart tapes you to the pillow so you can't move. He then slips off his shoes, and the smell hits you. Because he hadn't showered for a week and hadn't changed his socks in around two weeks the smell was indescribably horrific.

Bart: " Oh man, I can smell that from here... "

You are enjoying the smell, taking huge whiffs of the odor. It smells extremely strong, and very vinegary. His black socks are so sweaty that they actually appear shiny. He rams his massive socked foot right in your face, and because you are shrunk it was like being crushed under a huge giant's foot. There was no end to it, but you were having the time of your life. He keeps his feet there for a while and the smell gets worse as the feet get some air. He scrunches his toes, so you are enveloped in sweaty, warm, moist sock and covered in the vinegary sweat.

Bart: " Oh man, that feels so good. You are really enjoying this ain't ya'? How about we take this to the next level... You like bare feet? I've been wearing these for weeks, and my feet are so dirty. I have had these shoes on for like 3 days straight. "

Bart had been camping for a few days, so he had not taken his shoes off in around three days. You were still being smothered in Bart's shiny, moist socked feet. He then removes his socks and you are confronted with two huge, towering yellow feet. Each foot looked like it was 50 feet tall, and was gleaming with shiny sweat and you could see it running down each foot.

Bart: " See that sweat running down my stinking feet? I want you to drink that, and lick it all up. "

You go the the heal off his foot. You see all the vinegary sweat running down it. You open your mouth as a huge droplet which at your size was around 4 liters of sweat was nearing the bottom. It splashed in your face, and went in your mouth. It tasted so vinegary and was the same sensation as drinking lemon juice. You swallowed it down, and went for another. You were soaked through with the sweat of Bart Simpson's raw bare feet.

Bart: " Bet you liked that huh? Now, lie down while I rub my feet in your face! "

You laid back down, and the two towering yellow feet still pouring with sweat were forced in your face. The smell was divine, it was the worse thing you have ever smelled but it turned you on so much.

Bart: " Now, I think my toes need some attention. "

Bart moves his feet down, so that his toes are in your face. His toes looked disgusting, in between each toe was clogged up with hundreds of toe jam.

Bart: " Eat up all that toe jam little man, at this rate I can have you clean my body... I don't need showers. "

You got a mouthful of the toe jam, and it was very soft. You rubbed your face in it, and it was amazing. You licked in between every single toe, and it was making you gag but you couldn't stop. You couldn't help thinking what other evil things Bart had in store for you.

Bart: " Oh god that was amazing. Now, what next... "
11113.title: Bart makes you a foot slave...

choices: Smell and lick their bare feet
1112.content:
Bart takes a sock and stuffs it in your mouth. Before you could push the sock out, he grabs a piece of duct tape and tapes your mouth closed. He takes another sock and puts the toe section right under your nose.

Bart: "You just stay right there, I will be back later"

You have no choice but to stay where you are since Bart handcuffed you to the bed post. You watch Bart leave his room, giving you a grin before he closes his door behind him. You just lay there with nothing to do but taste the sweat of his sock and smell the stink of another sock. It isn't until an hour later that Bart comes back. As he opens the door and walks into his room, you see that he isn't alone. Right behind him is Millhouse, who has the same grin on his face that Bart does.

Bart: "Hey there, how was my socks? Hope you don't mind, but I brought a friend over to have some fun to."

Millhouse: "Hey, I'm Millhouse. Nice to meet you."

Bart: :Sorry we took so long, we went for a little jog before we came here. Oh, I forgot to tell you. You will now be our foot slave."

They walk next to you, staring down at you with sly grins on their faces. The first thing they do to you is...
1112.title: Bart has other ideas...

11121.content:
They took their shoes off. You see their dirty and sweaty white and grey socks and they came to you with a evil grin.
"We wore them all day and jog with them, slave", said Millhouse. He took his left sock and held it on your nose.
The smell was horrible and you forced againstt the stinky, dirty sock. You want to scream: "Please let me out!"
But you cant. Bart`s stinky old sock was in your mouth and you cant scream.
Bart`s evil grin was so evil that you can`t understand what Millhous did. You wanted to say: "Please Millhouse let me go", but the strong sock gag was in your mouth. You have to sniff Millhouse DIRTY and STINKY white ankle socks and you hate it. You wanted to get away from this house but you can´t. Now came Bart. His smile was evil and he wanted that you kiss his dirty white socks. "No", you try to refuse but you can´t, because the sock was in your mouth. Bart`s evil grin was was be stronger and he held his stinky and dirty white sock on your nose. You wanted to refuse but you cant. "You are only the dirt under my feet, slave!", said Bart and laughted. Millhouse had an idea: "I can gag him with my sweaty sock."
"It`s a good idea", Bart answered and Millhouse took out his socks and shoved them in my mouth. "Do they taste good",Millhouse laughed. He and Bart had an idea and whispered to each other. The next thing they did was....
11121.title: Smell their socks

choices: Wake up, with their feet on your face!
Wake up, naked, and tied up on Bart's bed
111211.content:
Both of the boys looked at you, their new slave, with almost intimidating grins. While it should be expected from Bart, the look on Millhouse's face showed that whatever they were planning was something devious. Though you had no time to react, and couldn't really do much anyway, as they sprang into action. Bart, being the stronger of the two, suddenly grabbed your head. While Millhouse pushed His used sock, along with both of Bart's fresh socks, right over your nose. And with both of them having just came back from a jog, there was no preparing for the combined scent.

Millhouse was staring you dead in the eye with a wide smirk on his face, while your own almost bugged out from going wide-eyed. The scent of just one of their feet alone was a lot, but three socks combined was just overwhelming. Your tried shaking your head to get away from the pungent musk, but with Bart holding it, there was no escaping. And with your mouth gagged with Millhouse's other sock. all of your air was filtered through the rank fabric.

"Enjoying the scent, slave?" Asked Bart from behind you "Take it in, take it allll in and sleep" Cooed Millhouse seemingly innocently like he wasn't forcing you to breathe their odors. Admittedly, you were feeling a bit lightheaded from the strong scent of their used socks, but you didn't think they were trying to make you pass out! Each sniff made you a bit dizzier though, and they noticed this.

"Go to sleep slave, go to sleep~" Whispered Bart into your ear, as Millhouse took Bart's shoe and pushed the opening up to your nose. A loud groan coming from you as your nose, along with the three socks, were forced into the opening of the shoe. And Millhouse kept it tight, making sure you could only take in the hot and humid air of the shoe. Your vision started to fade after a minute, the scent of their feet proving too much to take. The last thing you see was both of their smirking faces staring into your eyes, the last thing you hear was their snickers as you fade to black.

You aren't sure how long you are out, but when you finally come through, you notice that...
111211.title: ....knock you out

choices: In Lisa's room saved you from them
1112113.content: Where did you wake up?
1112113.title: Reader's choice

12.content:
The are the new kid in town your name is bane you just moved in and you go look around the new town your in. You go to a near by park you see some woman some men and so brats you look at a tree and she a girl wearing a red dress and some red shoes the looks up at you. You go to the tree where the tree is sit next to her and say hello my name is bane what's yours she says her name is Lisa I live my mom dad and my baby sister mangy also my stupid brother. You look at her and got a great plan you ask Lisa if she wants a bet she sad what kind of bet you say what ever you want if I win you have to give me £10 and if I win you my foot slave for the next 9 moths.

The race
You both sack hands you said the first one to that swing and back wins. Lisa was getting read you were also the race stared you where first for a sec Lisa runs right pass you and gets first place. Lisa now to pay up she takes of her shoes and say massage this foot you massaged each foot for 5 hours when you stop Lisa said your not done you still have to lick my feet. You pick up her foot and lick her smelly feet for the hole day. When it became night she takes you to a lad and shrinks you down and puts you in her shoe and she says don't I'll make you dig after havering my feet lick all night time so Lisa throws you into her and walks home.
12.title: Lisa bet

choices: In her Malibu Stacy dream House
123.content:
You arrive at her home. In her room, Lisa puts her bag on her bed and takes you out. "You wait here while I go eat dinner, and then you can lick my feet while I work!"

After Lisa leaves you look for a place to hide. She closed the door behind her, so you couldn't escape, so you'll just have to hide.

But where?
123.title: Hide

13.content:
It was a glorious summers day in springfield, the sun was shining and Bart and Lisa were sitting in on the couch, they had just finished watching Itchy and Scratchy when Lisa took off her red pump and dropped it on the floor she took the other one off after and lunged over towards Bart "Hey Bart dare you to smell this" she said trying to put it near his face, "Quit it lisa" " Your boring Bart, im gonna go find someone more fun to play with", she said throwing her shoe on the floor and leaving the room, after he had heard Lisa go upstairs he jumped onto the floor and grabbed her shoes, placing both on his face and breathing in the smell, they were extremely sweaty due to the weather, the insoles were moist as he noticed whilst rubbing them over his face, whilst doing this Bart was too engrossed in his sisters shoes to notice Marge peeking in from the kitchen, she had noticed in the past his attention towards feet but had never thought anything of it, but now she realised that he had a foot fetish, Marge herself had a foot fetish, however due to her and homers poor relationship she could never act on it, she at that point decided to make use of her sons foot fetish for her own fantasies. A few days passed and the sweltering heat continued, Bart was once again sitting in front of the TV when Marge walked in, she was wearing her usual green dress however now she was wearing a pair of light pink sandals, she sat down on the couch and relaxed, "I like your shoes mom" Bart said, "Thank you dear, I got a pedicure yesterday and decided to show off my tootsies" she said whilst wiggling her toes, they both returned to watching the TV until Marge spoke up "Bart honey, my feet have been killing me all day, I dont suppose you'd give me a foot massage would you?", Bart couldnt believe it, he had been hoping for this for years, he jumped at the chance "Sure mom" he said trying not to seem so eager, he shuffled over to her feet. he grabbed a foot by the ankle and took off the sandal, he took a second to admire her toes, they were long and thin, with her toenails painted a shade of blue similar to her hair, "I like your nail polish mom, it suits you" he said whilst his face slowly turned red, he placed his hands on either side of her foot and started kneeding on her sole, the softness was bliss, he carried on for 10 minutes before switching to the other foot, he carried on and before long Marge had seemed to go to sleep, Bart decided he should take advantage of the situation but was unsure of what to do....

What does he do?
13.title: Marge

131.content: Start from the bottom or top?
131.title: Lick her foot

info.brief_description: You get to do anything foot related with a wide range of Simpsons characters! Free to add!
info.description:
This is an interactive story where you get to do anything foot - related to anyone from the Simpsons that you can think of. You can choose either to be shrunken or for them to grow in size etc. Feel free to add to this story, but make sure that your grammar is correct as well as your spelling. I'm not too worried about the content.

Allowed:

* Smelling
* Licking
* Foot Worship (Single or Multiple)
* Nudity
* Sex (Gay or Heterosexual)


Not Allowed:

* Death of any characters
